productName: New Balance Burn+ Cricket Batting Gloves
description: The New Balance Burn+ Cricket Batting Gloves have a sheep leather palm and 20mm crosslink foam padding. These batting gloves have elasticated double sided sweat band. It also has a high grade stretchable and ventilated gusset. The gloves have sidebar protection on lead head only.

productName: New Balance DC 1180 Cricket Batting Gloves
description: The New Balance DC 1180 Batting Gloves are suitable for players playing at the highest level. These gloves are extremely lightweight and designed for a flexible grip especially pliable on the fingers. The gloves are designed to provide maximum protection while giving good ventilation. The gloves have a wide velcro opening and sweat absorbing wrist grip.

productName: New Balance TC 1060 Cricket Batting Gloves
description: The New Balance TC 1060 Cricket Batting Gloves have a 9mm Cross Link Padding. The batting gloves have an additional protection on entire length of 2 lead fingers.The gloves have an elasticated single sided sweat band. Additionally, it has high grade stretchable and ventilated gusset and a sheep leather palm.
